sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Box,
  Typography,
  Button,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardMedia,
  CardContent,
  CardActions,
  Container,
  Paper,
} from '@mui/material';

function HomePage() {
  // Featured episodes data
  const featuredEpisodes = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'Episode 1: Monotone/Colorful',
      description: 'Kousei Arima was a piano prodigy until his mother died when he was eleven years old.',
      image: 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Your_Lie_in_April_Manga_cover.png',
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'Episode 2: Friend A',
      description: 'Kaori forces Kousei to be her accompanist for a violin competition, but he refuses.',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MjExMzQtMzJlZS00NWU3LTg3NDItYTY5YzU4YzYwZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'Episode 3: Inside Spring',
      description: 'Kousei reluctantly agrees to be Kaori\'s accompanist, but his trauma prevents him from hearing the piano.',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzg5MmI0ZDctODg1Ny00ZDgxLWI0MDgtYmNhZmFiYzM2MWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Paper
        sx={{
          position: 'relative',
          backgroundColor: 'grey.800',
          color: '#fff',
          mb: 4,
          backgroundSize: 'cover',
          backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat',
          backgroundPosition: 'center',
          backgroundImage: `url(../assets)`,
          height: '500px',
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          justifyContent: 'center',
        }}
      >
        {/* Increase the priority of the hero background image */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            bottom: 0,
            right: 0,
            left: 0,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,.6)',
          }}
        />
        <Container maxWidth="md" sx={{ position: 'relative', textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography component="h1" variant="h2" color="inherit" gutterBottom>
            Your Lie in April
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" color="inherit" paragraph>
            A heartwarming story about music, friendship, and love
          </Typography>
          <Button
            variant="contained"
            color="secondary"
            component={RouterLink}
            to="/episodes"
            size="large"
            sx={{ mt: 3 }}
          >
            Watch Episodes
          </Button>
        </Container>
      </Paper>

      {/* Featured Episodes Section */}
      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mb: 6 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
          Featured Episodes
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          {featuredEpisodes.map((episode) => (
            <Grid item key={episode.id} xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Card
                sx={{
                  height: '100%',
                  display: 'flex',
                  flexDirection: 'column',
                  transition: '0.3s',
                  '&:hover': {
                    transform: 'translateY(-5px)',
                    boxShadow: '0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
                  },
                }}
              >
                <CardMedia
                  component="img"
                  height="200"
                  image={episode.image}
                  alt={episode.title}
                />
                <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
                  <Typography gutterBottom variant="h6" component="h3">
                    {episode.title}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                    {episode.description}
                  </Typography>
                </CardContent>
                <CardActions>
                  <Button
                    size="small"
                    color="primary"
                    component={RouterLink}
                    to={`/episodes/${episode.id}`}
                  >
                    Watch Now
                  </Button>
                </CardActions>
              </Card>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* About Section */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: 'background.paper', py: 6 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom>
                About Your Lie in April
              </Typography>
              <Typography paragraph>
                Your Lie in April (四月は君の嘘, Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso) is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Naoshi Arakawa.
              </Typography>
              <Typography paragraph>
                The story follows Kousei Arima, a piano prodigy who loses his ability to hear the piano after his mother's death. 
                His life changes when he meets Kaori Miyazono, a free-spirited violinist who helps him rediscover his love for music.
              </Typography>
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                color="primary"
                component={RouterLink}
                to="/about"
                sx={{ mt: 2 }}
              >
                Learn More
              </Button>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box
                component="img"
                src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYThlNWY5ZDgtYTIxNC00ZjdiLWJmNGUtMDFjMDlmZTAzOWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg"
                alt="Your Lie in April"
                sx={{
                  width: '100%',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  boxShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
                }}
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default HomePage;
